scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "nodemon server.js" "cd app && npm run dev"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { if (require('fs').existsSync('./start-app.js')) { require('fs').chmodSync('./start-app.js', '755'); }} catch(e) { console.log('Warning: ' + e.message); }"
scripts.docker:run: docker run -p 3000:3000 -e OPENAI_API_KEY=${OPENAI_API_KEY} -e DOCKER_CONTAINER=true -e PORT=3000 drewclark-portfolio
